mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product (nameproduct, priceproduct, pointproduct, noteproduct, countstock, countsell, seller_id, idcategorysml, realsize) values (#{nameproduct}, #{priceproduct}, #{pointproduct}, #{noteproduct}, #{countstock}, #{countsell}, #{seller_id}, #{idcategorysml}, #{realsize})
mapper.select: select nameproduct, priceproduct, pointproduct, noteproduct, countstock, countsell, seller_id, idcategorysml, realsize from tbl_product where idproduct = #{idproduct}
